channel.title: Move npc's on garboscape
channel.description:
HI guys, I just manage to change the home tele to varrock. Now i need to move the npc's to varrock. Wich file is it? -.- Cant find it at all. Have been looking everywhere :s
One more thing.. After i changed the home tele to varrock the edgeville pk tele also tele to varrock.. How do i change it? :d

item.title: Move npc's on garboscape
item.dc:creator: @Jaran Jaran
item.description:
@Jaran wrote:

Tyvm

Read full topic

item.title: Move npc's on garboscape
item.dc:creator: @Ice_Age_Elmo Ice Age Elmo
item.description:
@Ice_Age_Elmo wrote:

Go to autospawn.cfg
Probably in your config folder

Example for one npc:

spawn = 1153	3500	9519	2	3511	9528	3500	9517	1
spawn = ID	XXXX	YYYY	Z	3511	9528	3500	9517	1

ID = NPC Id
XXXX = X coord for npc
YYYY = Y coord for npc
Z = height level for npc (usually 0)
The rest is if you want to make the npc walk around

Read full topic

to edit where the NPCs are, go into autospawn.cfg
